attributes.action: end the current expenses fiasco by calling a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the quickest way to end the current fiasco and restore public confidence in parliament is to call a general election and for MPs to stand on their own records and allow the electorate to decide. The new parliament can then decide on how MPs should be remunerated.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
